content: f i k a by cj brady designs # # fika fee-ka swedish noun a moment to slow down and appreciate the good things in life such as coffee with friends i wrote this pattern to release on the memorial day holiday weekend these long weekends are meant for slowing down and relaxing with family and friends and if you are lucky you can add in yarn and crocheting or knitting with this pattern you can make a cowl or an infinity scarf fika is crocheted end to end so that you can find your perfect stopping point before you do the final easy whip stitch seam to join in the round i recently found the lion brand comfy cotton blend that comes in solid and variegated colors and is 200 grams and 392 yards i bought several and realized that the solid color whipped cream is much softer and fluffier than the other variegated colors this color is fluffy and light and just perfect for a soft cowl or infinity scarf for warmer temperatures with one skein of the comfy cotton you can make two cowls or one infinity scarf the stitch pattern is a one-row repeat and you can crochet a cowl in several hours or you can use a cozy wool yarn for a warm toasty cowl for winter so enjoy some free time and slow down crochet and appreciate the good things in life getting started yarn approximately 175 yards of dk or light worsted weight yarn for a cowl and about 350 yards for an infinity scarf suggested yarn lion brand comfy cotton blend dk 392 yards 200 grams yarn shown is comfy cotton in the color whipped cream sizes and dimensions cowl or infinity scarf sizes the cowl will measure approximately 30 inches in circumference 15 inches across and 9 inches wide an infinity scarf will measure approximately 60 inches in circumference 30 inches across and about 9 inches wide the pattern is easily customized for length by subtracting or adding on more of the row repeats or for width or for other yarn weights by altering the starting sequence hook and gauge size j 6 0 mm not critical loose gauge recommended supplies blocking mats or bath towels and pins water spray bottle for light spritz wet blocking darning needle for the sewing final seam and for sewing in loose ends pattern &
